details.description:
The European Data Forum 2014 is the annual meeting-point for data practitioners from industry, research, policy makers, the wider public-sector and community initiatives, to discuss the opportunities and challenges of the emerging Data Economy in Europe.
Participating within EDF 2014 will be global experts in a wide range of fields, including: research, semantic technology, open and linked data, mobile application development and technical communications. By bringing together all stakeholders and practitioners involved in the data industry, this will allow for the fostering of ideas, new innovations and problem-solving associated challenges, leading to a strengthened data economy within Europe and increasing its visibility worldwide.
details.excerpt: The [European Data Forum 2014](http://2014.data-forum.eu/) is the annual meeting-point for data practitioners from industry, research, policy makers, the wider public-sector and community initiatives, to discuss the opportunities and challenges of the emerging Data Economy in Europe.
